BBEX3.A.RSD.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Serbia  / USD 1 = RSD ... (buying)

General: * Independent since 3 June 2006; formerly "Serbia and Montenegro". The euro has been the sole legal tender in Montenegro since 1 April 2002. On 25 October 2006, the ISO code was changed from CSD to RSD.
Source: National Bank of Serbia, Belgrade
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.
Comment on 2006: The exchange rates set in CSD until mid-October 2006 were included in the calculation.
